name: 8 To Glory - The Official Game of the PBR
name_original: 8 To Glory - The Official Game of the PBR
description:
8 To Glory - Bull Riding, the official game of the PBR, gives you the full experience of being a professional bull rider in the TOUGHEST SPORT ON DIRT®. Show your skills as one of the world's top bull riders against the toughest bulls in the sport today. Play season mode where you progress through the full 2018 circuit from New York City to the World Final in Las Vegas. Unlock rewards including new bulls and riders that you can challenge anytime, and gain points on your road to the championship. Challenge a friend to local head-to-head mode, where one player is the rider and the other controls one of the famous PBR bulls.
Features
• Multiple game modes including single player season campaign, arcade mode and local multiplayer head-to-head Last Cowboy Standing mode.
• 40 top riders
• 30 top bulls
• Dozens of in-game cards to collect to unlock riders, bulls, and gear
• Real PBR announcers and bullfighters
• The only officially licensed video game of the PBR
1-2 players
4GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
